title: Histoire(s) du Cinéma 3a: The Coin of the Absolute
original_title: Histoire(s) du cinéma 3a : la monnaie de l'absolu
overview: Part 5 of Godard's 8 part examination of the history of the concept of cinema and how it relates to the 20th century.
synopsis: Part 5 of Godard's 8 part examination of the history of the concept of cinema and how it relates to the 20th century.
